channel.title: Need Help With Some Questions!
channel.description:
Hello,
I need some help with some questions :P Hope somewane can help me :D
1. How can i change Icons of shops now when its infinity i have got 0 icon but i want the other infinity icon ( If you understand what i mean :P)
2. Need help i have coded a npc system that when you kill a npc you will recieve npc points but i want to make a shop you can use it on like
"A Red partyHat cost 200Npc Points and you got 200Npc Points you buy it and you got 0 Npc Points left and i want to make a command that you can see your npc points like
("NpcPoints
"Amount of NpcPoints"
3. Where can i find GWD models and in what file i gotta add it in (idk never did it before:P)
4. My final question how can i do something like this
when you Click on the teleport you teleport like to King Black Dragon and it will say
"You have teleported to the KBD lair"
Thanks! :D
Sorry 1 more question
I need a new Yell command 1 that i can make items unspawnable and then says This Item Is Unspawnable
